info.title: StreamAPI Reference
description:
The StreamAPI enables interaction with ParadigmCore via JSONRPC/WebSocket.
The API is served by the `StreamServer`, an optional component included as part of the `api` module in ParadigmCore.
StreamAPI follows the JSONRPC-2.0 specification. More information available at http://www.jsonrpc.org/specification.
Calling this method will cancel all subscriptions, and immediately close the client/server connection.

errors.description: The server encountered an error processing the request.

subscription.start.summary: Subscribe to a specific ParadigmCore event.
subscription.start.description: Initiate a subscription to an OrderStream node for specific blockchain and state-related events.

eventName.description: The name of the event you are subscribing to. Can be 'order' or 'block' currently.

filters.description: An array of strings to be used as response filters. If present, only the keys in the filter array will be included in the response.

response.description: The server's response to the subscription-start request.

subscriptionId.description: A unique ID that can be used for filtering many event subscriptions.

errors.description: The server encountered an error processing the request.

subscription.end.summary: Unsubscribe from a specific ParadigmCore event.
subscription.end.description: Immediately end a subscription to a certain event, and stop receiving notifications.

subscriptionId.description: A unique ID provided by the server upon an event subscription.

response.description: The server's response to the subscription-end request.

errors.description: The server encountered an error processing the request.

state.latestHeight.summary: Return the height of the best known block.
state.latestHeight.description: The `block.latestHeight` method will return the integer height of the latest block committed to the blockchain.

height.description: The integer height of the latest committed block.

errors.description: The server encountered an error processing the request.

state.orderCounter.description: Return the incremental counter that tracks the in-state number of total `order` transactions.

response.description: The result of the query, as a number. Counts the number of total orders processed by the network since genesis.

errors.description: The server encountered an error processing the request.

state.query.summary: Query the permitted fields of an OrderStream node's state.
description: The `state.query` method allows RPC's to return information about the node (and a connected network's) public state.

The `params.path` field can be used to direct a query to a particular path of the current state. The `path` is passed to ParadigmCore's ABCI `query` method, and the result of that function is returned.

path.description: The `path` string is passed to the `abci_query` method and directs a query towards a particular state account object.

response.description: The result of the query, as a string (more documentation coming soon).

errors.description: The server encountered an error processing the request.
